text: ql -ayha alrswl- lhwla' almghtryn balamwal walawlad: 'iina rabiy ywssie alrizq ealaa man yasha' min ebadh, wydyiqh ealaa man ysha'; lhkmt yelmha, wamahma 'aetaytm min shay' fima 'amrakum bih fahu yewdh lakum fi aldunya balbdl, wafi alakhirat balthwab, wahu -sbhanh- khayr alrazqyn, fatlbu alrizq minh whdh, waseau fi al'asbab alty 'amrakum bha
